content: and push the carabiner/etc through the strap that s what i did - weave in all ends - you re done wowee *** tunisian simple stitch there are a ton of tutorials out there and strap it is a fun technique to learn if you have never done tunisian crochet you don t need any special tools for a stitch count this low - leave a long-ish tail and chain 4 tunisian simple stitch*** so use this opportunity to learn something new <3 until desired length is reached do not fasten_off i made mine 150 cm ~60in wrap it around you the way thank you so much for using my pattern and i would be absolutely you want to wear it in the future if you re unsure about the thrilled if you would tag me on instagram @bomstuh in any pics length a it s going to stretch a bit with use b i would of your cute little strap h on e s recommend making it too long rather than too short because
